node.summary:

It’s a good stopover and there are a couple decent hotels in Dirang and a handful of attractions or places to visit in Dirang and Dirang valley.
We stayed at Pemaling Hotel Dirang which is the #1 hotel in Dirang….
Dirang DzongWe wandering Dirang and went to a place called Dirang Dzong which is a tribal area with a 9th century prison.

node.title: Secret Little Sangti Valley in NE India
node.summary:
Sangti Valley is 15 km outside Dirang, buried in the Eastern Himalayas, and another stop in Arunachal Pradesh tourism that many won’t see as it’s often overlooked.
While touring the backwaters of Kerala became famous for its beauty and now everyone goes, one day when Arunachal tourism picks up, Sangti Valley will be flooded by tourists.
It’s one of the most stunning places I’ve been.
Sangti Valley is where the black neck crane comes each year.
They deserve some attention, especially Sangti Valley!

node.title: Do You Need a Filtered Water Bottle For India Travel?
node.summary:
Whether or not to get a filtered water bottle for India travel is something I am asked about at least once a week – and it’s asked in my India travel tips Facebook group often.
I lived and traveled in India since 2012 and I never used a filtered water bottle.
When traveling, I would buy bottled water (20 INR around $1) or if I was in a nice tourist-friendly restaurant, I would drink filtered water (served free).
Options for a filtered water bottle for India travelIf you would rather bring a filtered water bottle, usually the biggest concern is if the bottle will clean the water enough to make sure you won’t get sick.

What makes Phnom Penh a perfect destination for travelers seeking a glamorous trip?
Phnom Penh may not be known as a glamorous destination, but that is quickly changing.
You can live in luxury for very little money, so we can live and travel much more comfortably here in Phnom Penh than we could in the USA.

Hamburg is one of the three cities in Germany with over one million inhabitants.
This rather suburban area is located right at the river Elbe and makes this part of Hamburg very idyllic.
Make sure you grab a drink or a bite to eat at the “Alex” as you will have a great view over the Binnenalster .
[Book a room | Book a flight to Hamburg Germany] Julia Haase (23) is a German expat and a recent graduate of Political Communications in London.

I do wear scarves, love red wine and think french bread is the only kind of real bread.
Wrong Clichés About French Travelers1.

For over a decade I worked in the media and was lucky enough to visit top restaurants and 5 star hotels.
Then I discovered Bali, where you can enjoy a stay in beautiful surroundings and feel like a VIP, on a tiny budget.
A lover of food, yoga, beaches and nature, you can follow Claire’s insight into beautiful travel on a budget at BackpackingBella.com.

I stayed for two nights at Villa Sungai, which is inland about 40 minutes from Seminyak (driving through Canggu).
The Villa Pool & FoodThe whole villa has three rooms and they look about the same although one is larger than the other two.
We ended up watching Lion which was so good and I don’t think anyone can watch this without crying.

node.title: A Luxury Guide to Lake Bled
node.summary:

Lake Bled is known worldwide for its stunning beauty, but maybe not everybody knows that Slovenia is a leader in the wellness and thermal Spas field, as well as in hospitality, making of Lake Bled a mecca for people seeking for a 5 stars getaway.
My favorite hotel in Lake Bled is the Hotel Golf , which is actually a 4 star.
It’s a very big block of cream and pastry, and it’s really really good.

Santa Marta is sunny!

node.title: Adventure on Colombian Coast (5 EPIC things to do)
node.summary:
If you want adventure on Colombian coast, look no further.
Inevitably, most backpackers hit up the extraordinary Caribbean coast, basing themselves in the gringo hotspots of Cartagena and Santa Marta.
Although the Colombian coast is actually home to a few of these volcanoes, Volcán de Lodo El Totumo is the most accessible, via a half-day trip from Cartagena.
Motorcycle along the coast to RiohachaYou don’t have to be a hefty tattooed man to embrace the freedom of a motorcycle.
Though most visitors choose to also sleep at Elemento, you can visit on a day pass for a cool 20,000 pesos.

Luxury hotels and other experiences are uniquely Nepali in design and flavor.
In Patan, the Patan Museum and Patan Durbar Square cannot be topped.
The luxury hotels provide good massage and spa services, but my favourite is Wellness Spa, above Café Cheeno in Patan.

node.title: Funny Peek Inside Langkawi 3D Museum
node.summary:
The brand new Langkawi 3D museum was such a silly fun way to spend the day.
It’s funny that in Asia, to me anyways, it seems people are more apt to take lots of photos.
I see more selfie sticks here, more people taking selfies, and so it just seems perfect to have a museum like this.
There are over 100 pieces of 3D art to play around with.
This is located in Oriental Village and you can spend a whole day here doing the 3D museum, skycab, shopping, and much more I explain over in this post: what to do in Langkawi.

node.title: This is India! (two)- Hippie in Heels
node.summary:
We walk into an Indian shop in Little India, Singapore.
The Indian man reminds us of home and Ben asks, do you do Indian recharge?
The man says, “you have Indian SIM, Indian phone?” Ben assures him he does.
In case you aren’t familiar with the recharge process, most people have cell phones with refill-able SIM cards in India.
Now, it would have been simpler to say, “I don’t do Indian recharge” but he didn’t want to say that!

node.title: This is India! 57
node.summary:
I always have funny/weird stories about India to share with friends or family when I talk to them.
Now your story,If you’ve been to India or read my blog often, you’ll know that of all the habits the Brits gave to India, standing patiently in the queue isn’t one of them.
On a flight in India is when you’ll see things that shock you… I promise you that.
Outside India, I stay seated until it’s my aisles turn, but if you do that flying in India no one will give you a turn.
I know, I know I’m supposed to love everything about India and only say nice things… but I do lost my temper.

node.title: Luxury Guide to Krakow
node.summary:
Tourist from all over to world visit Krakow to see beautiful Rynek (Old Town) and go for one-day trip to neighbouring Wieliczka, famous salt-mine.
There are many 5-star hotels in Krakow, but we would choose Hotel Stary.
Mainly because it’s situated in the heart of Old Town and the views from the hotel rooms are really amazing!
When you are in Krakow, there’s no point for staying anywhere else.
So again, we’d recommend Hotel Stary and maybe Grand Hotel or Copernicus.

node.title: 3 Ugandan Orphans that Changed My Life
node.summary:
Nicholas Uganda Children’s Fund thought it’d be a great idea for me to meet a few of the Ugandan orphans they help put in school.
The girls didn’t have watches so they guessed) they girls arrived with a baby boy in tow.
They handed me the baby, laughing, “white people love our babies!” and told me they were watching him for their neighbor.
If you didn’t know what stripper shoes were and you were 17, I suppose you’d think they were the most gorgeous shoes in the world, like Cinderella’s glass slippers.
I can’t remember if it was their cousin or sister that they didn’t know about, but Michelle now had another mouth to feed.
